Title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
FullTitle: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings (2021)
SortTitle: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
Plot: Shang-Chi, the master of weaponry-based Kung Fu, is forced to confront his past after being drawn into the Ten Rings organization.
Writers: Dave Callaham, Destin Daniel Cretton, Andrew Lanham
Stars: Simu Liu, Awkwafina, Tony Chiu-Wai Leung
